ing: 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple in juice (such as DoleÂ®), undrained
1 cup miniature marshmallows (such as KraftÂ® Jet-Puffed)
1 (3.4 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix (such as Jell-OÂ®)
1 1/2 cups frozen whipped topping (such as Cool WhipÂ®), thawed
des: "Easiest recipe on the planet and it tastes awesome. I love this at Easter, but it could great any time of the year."
ins: Mix pineapple, marshmallows, pudding mix, and pecans together in a bowl; fold in whipped topping. Refrigerate salad until chilled and thickened, about 1 hour.
